alright jokes aside so i got a key then a couple days later while i was trying to get the nearly extinct hextech chest, it dissapeared when i looked for it in loot, i dont remember ever useing that key any help? btw please make chests and key shards easyier to obtain like jesus christ it took me 20 games for a single key shard once,

replies.body:
I edited out your personal information in this post.  If you are unable to see content in the updated client's hextech screen, see if it shows up on the legacy client:

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

Let me know if that helps!

I have the same problem i had 2 key fragments, last night now i changed my client, i played a few one for all and i checked my crafting stuff as i usually do before i log out and I see my fragments are missing whats that all about?
